pullRequest.bodyText:
…ng the instances

If the hostname is not set at creation during FreeIPA bootstrapping they were reset by Google Cloud causing salt script failures that depend on hostname -f
But this need not be set for other host groups.
Also for FreeIPA do not hard code a single instance because that assumption breaks down in repair and HA scenarios.

./gradlew build
